name: Paremus
overview:
Paremus provides an OSGi based private-cloud runtime: the Paremus Service Fabric.

The Service Fabric replaces traditional silo-ed application server & compute Grids and associated ad-hoc provisioning, management & CMDB tools; with an elastic, self repairing, self-describing runtime; where composite applications are dynamically assembled on-demand.

The Paremus Service Fabric can be used as the distributed runtime for your OSGi Blueprint, Declarative Service or Spring applications and also supports JEE and WAR based applications via support for Glassfish, Jetty and Tomcat.

The Paremus Service Fabric command and control sub-systems adaptively distributed across available compute nodes.

Paremus engineers contribute the a number of OSGi Alliance initiatives and currently lead the OBR resolver RFC and the OSGi / Cloud computing RFP.
